about.title: About This Database
about.purposeText: This grants database aims to connect Ukrainian civil society organizations with funding opportunities to support their important work.
about.howToUseText: Use the search and filter functions to find grants that match your organization's needs. Each grant listing provides key information and links to official application pages.
